targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r.cpu == "cpu-total"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] != "usage_idle" and r["_field"] != "used")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.host == "${system_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey:["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with
    _value: float(v: r.load1) / float(v: r.n_cpus) * 100.0
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system" and r.host == "${system_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load15" or r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey:["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with
    _value: float(v: r.load15) / float(v: r.n_cpus) * 100.0
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "swap_total" or r["_field"] == "swap_free")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.swap_total - r.swap_free) / float(v: r.swap_total) * 100.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_users")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
//   |> yield(name: "last")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "swap_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r.cpu == "cpu-total" and
    (r._field != "usage_idle") and
    (r._field != "usage_active")
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r["_field"] == "buffered") or
    (r["_field"] == "page_tables") or
    (r["_field"] == "swap_cached") or
    (r["_field"] == "slab") or
    (r["_field"] == "cached") or
    (r["_field"] == "free") or
    (r["_field"] == "total")
    )

  // we do a minor aggregate here to help performance during the pivot and map:
  // but sometimes it causes a bit of irregularity in the data output at larger window sizes
  |> aggregateWindow(every: duration(v: int(v: v.windowPeriod) / 13), fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.total - (r.buffered + r.page_tables + r.swap_cached + r.slab + r.cached + r.free) }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_value", "_start", "_stop", "_time", "host"])
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "application_used")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "page_tables")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "swap_cached")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "slab")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cached")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "buffered")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "free")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "available")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "mem"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "shared")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

import "strings"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "net" and
    not strings.hasPrefix(v: r["interface"], prefix: "veth") and
    r["_field"] == "bytes_sent"
  )
//  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
//  |> difference(nonNegative: true, initialZero: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"send "+r.interface}))

import "strings"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "net" and
    not strings.hasPrefix(v: r["interface"], prefix: "veth") and
    r["_field"] == "bytes_recv"
  )
//  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv")
//  |> difference(nonNegative: true, initialZero: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"], timeColumn: "_time")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"recv "+r.interface}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "system" and
    (r._field == "load1" or r._field == "load5" or r._field == "load15")
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "read_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r.host+" "+r.name+" bytes read"}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "write_bytes")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r.host+" "+r.name+" bytes written"}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "io_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${system_hostname}")
  |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r.name+" io time"}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host == "${system_hostname}" and
    r._measurement == "disk"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:"used device "+r.device+" at "+r.path+" (type "+r.fstype+" "+r.mode+")"}))

list.label: Host
list.name: system_hostname
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "${bucket}",
    tag: "host",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
